title: Ticker : Stocks Portfolio Mgr
summary: Track your stocks investment portfolio in style with ease anytime anywhere.
developerAddress:
Unit 219, 2/F, Core Building 2,
Hong Kong Science Park
Shatin,
N.T.
Hong Kong
description: Ticker - Stocks Portfolio Manager for Investors on the move.Portfolio Management & Tracking- Manage and track multiple portfolios with beautiful charts, graphs and detailed P&L - Enter your trades, dividends, splits and see your positions and P/L live - Full Portfolio performance metrics calculated: MWRR, TWRR for the last 3 years - 4 different Android Widgets at your command- Monitor your favourite Stocks with push notification alerts , highly customizable (price, volume, % change) Ticker can be used anonymously without an account.  However, it is highly recommended that you do sign up with your email, because with an account, you can carry your data to new phones, and can access the same synchronised data from multiple devices.  Please sign up and tell your friends about Ticker!* Note: You may use the app for free up to a certain usage limit only, sufficient for light data users.  Optional Paid subscription available for heavy data users, please refer to Subscription page in App for details of limits.* Note: Please understand Ticker only support Stocks in designated Stock Markets we choose.  Please do not have false expectation for support of other assets or stock markets we do not explicitly say we support.* Note: App requires active internet connection at all times.  There is no offline mode.* Note: While we strive to keep our servers up most of the time, we cannot promise 100% uptime, there will be outages (subscribers and free users alike), but we will try our best to keep this to a minimum.---------------------------- Data Supported: Stock Quotes, Market Capitalisation, Open, Day High, Day Low, Previous Close, 52 week High, 52 week low, volume, average volume, P/E, P/B, 1D, 5D, 1 Week, 1 Year, 2 Years graph, NewsStock Markets Supported: Major World Indices, United States, Mexico, Canada, Brazil, Germany, United Kingdom, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Sweden, Switzerland, Europe, Portugal, Spain, Israel, Australia, Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, South Korea Currency Pairs Supported: USD/EUR, USD/JPY, GBP/USD, AUD/USD, USD/CAD, USD/CHF, USD/HKD, USD/NZD----------------------------
descriptionHTML:
Ticker - Stocks Portfolio Manager for Investors on the move.

Portfolio Management & Tracking
- Manage and track multiple portfolios with beautiful charts, graphs and detailed P&L
- Enter your trades, dividends, splits and see your positions and P/L live
- Full Portfolio performance metrics calculated: MWRR, TWRR for the last 3 years
- 4 different Android Widgets at your command
- Monitor your favourite Stocks with push notification alerts , highly customizable (price, volume, % change)

Ticker can be used anonymously without an account. However, it is highly recommended that you do sign up with your email, because with an account, you can carry your data to new phones, and can access the same synchronised data from multiple devices. Please sign up and tell your friends about Ticker!

* Note: You may use the app for free up to a certain usage limit only, sufficient for light data users. Optional Paid subscription available for heavy data users, please refer to Subscription page in App for details of limits.

* Note: Please understand Ticker only support Stocks in designated Stock Markets we choose. Please do not have false expectation for support of other assets or stock markets we do not explicitly say we support.

* Note: App requires active internet connection at all times. There is no offline mode.

* Note: While we strive to keep our servers up most of the time, we cannot promise 100% uptime, there will be outages (subscribers and free users alike), but we will try our best to keep this to a minimum.

----------------------------
Data Supported: Stock Quotes, Market Capitalisation, Open, Day High, Day Low, Previous Close, 52 week High, 52 week low, volume, average volume, P/E, P/B, 1D, 5D, 1 Week, 1 Year, 2 Years graph, News

Stock Markets Supported: Major World Indices, United States, Mexico, Canada, Brazil, Germany, United Kingdom, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Sweden, Switzerland, Europe, Portugal, Spain, Israel, Australia, Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, South Korea

Currency Pairs Supported: USD/EUR, USD/JPY, GBP/USD, AUD/USD, USD/CAD, USD/CHF, USD/HKD, USD/NZD
----------------------------
comments: Now that Google Finance will no longer allow portfolio tracking I was looking for an alternative. This app gives some cool views and nice tracking including some great graphs. I would love to see details on all my portfolios together like it does within each portfolio since I can't mix stocks of different currencies within one portfolio so a full view is not really available. Plus I'd love to set the home page to see what I want right away. Still a great tracker for your stocks, just shy of what I use to have.

Works well, and displays an all important chart of my entire portfolio, which it seems no other app does. I would purchase if it wasn't subscription based - a subscription isn't warranted for this kind of service. Now I'm back on the hunt for a similar app which offers the same features through an outright purchase rather than subscription based licence.

Recently, the quote updates have been terrible on this app. I try to refresh at 11am and it still shows me the prices from yesterday. I use Ticker for all my watchlists and portfolios, but will be moving on to better, more reliable apps soon .

Great app! A lot of info carefully organized with helpful widgets. Love the candlestick charts built in.  Updated: quotes aren't real time. It's useless if the quotes aren't updating until the end of the day.
Was a great app so paid for monthly subscription. Now it's stopped refreshing or loading up the quotes, just frozen on the same share prices for whole day! Going to cancel my subscription! Shame

It was great, but now it doesn't refresh stocks from MOEX (at random - some is ok, graphs are ok, but prices are out of date so P/L is wrong). Disappointed, 'cause it's really useful app. But no longer for me.
